trends: There have been 106 other sightings in San Jose
There were no other sightings in San Jose on or around October 30th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was coming from my office with a co-worker where we saw and orange light with a trail of smoke that seemed to be coming down slowly towards the mountain. We thought that was a plane that was coming down on fire, but nothing was reported on the local news
